casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF Michael R. SPECK, An Attorney At Law (Attorney No. 025291987) R-15 September Term 2017
080870 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 06, 2018

ORDER

This matter having been duly presented to the Court on the petition of respondent, Michael R. Speck, for review of the decision of the Disciplinary Review Board in DRB 17-336, and good cause appearing;

It is ORDERED that the petition for review is denied.
